if(i == xxxx) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 9152; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 7104; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 7104; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 796; class8.anInt174 = 4; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 14; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 5; class8.anInt200 = 5; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Donator Cape"; // made by nathanr87 class8.aByteArray178 = "The cape worn by Donators -made by nathan87.".getBytes(); }

itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 500; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6; itemDef.description = "A donators cape" itemDef.name = Donators Cape itemDef.maleEquip1 = 5; itemDef.femaleEquip = 5; itemDef.anInt204 = 14; itemDef.anInt175 = -1; itemDef.anInt197 = -1; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 57280; itemDef.originalModelColors[1] = 54503; itemDef.originalModelColors[2] = 54183; itemDef.originalModelColors[3] = 11200; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 9152; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[1] = 7104; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[2] = 7104; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[3] = 796; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.modelID = 4
